comment1.author: Sam Skinner
comment1.text: It's good that you're doing this, but don't forget those OMM emails.

comment2.author: Christian Lemieux
comment2.text: Just wanted to say hello from my honeymoon, y'all. But also, I think these things can be shorter.

comment3.author: Eric Lee
comment3.text: I agree with this. John's presentation are always very to the point. It's good to have him start first and set the bar for the rest of the presentations.
